columns.ID: A unique identifier for each student in the high school.
columns.name: The name of the high school student.
columns.grade: The current grade level of the student, ranging from 9 to 12.

Highschooler.table_description: The Highschooler table stores information about students in a high school, including their unique ID, name, and current grade level.

columns.friend_id: This column represents the unique identifier of a friend associated with a student, establishing a link to another student.
columns.student_id: This column denotes the unique identifier of a student who has the specified friend.

Friend.table_description: The Friend table captures the relationships between students, identifying pairs of friends through their unique identifiers.

columns.student_id: An identifier for the student who is expressing a like.
columns.liked_id: An identifier for the student who is being liked.

Likes.table_description: The Likes table records relationships between students based on the likes they express towards each other.
